001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriber;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberErrorLog;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
008import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactory;
015import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLGenerator;
016import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLMapper;
017import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
018
019import java.io.*;
020import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
021import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
022
023public class FilePersistentSubscriberErrorLog
024        implements PersistentSubscriberErrorLog {
025    private final Logger logger;
026    private String name;
027    private YAMLMapper yamlMapper;
028    private FileOutputStream out;
029
030    public FilePersistentSubscriberErrorLog(Logger logger) {
031        this.logger = logger;
032        yamlMapper = new YAMLMapper(new YAMLFactory()
033                .disable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.WRITE_DOC_START_MARKER));
034        yamlMapper.configure(JsonGenerator.Feature.AUTO_CLOSE_TARGET, false);
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public void init(PersistentSubscriberConfiguration configuration, PersistentSubscriber persistentSubscriber) throws IOException {
039        name = configuration.getName();
040        File errorLog = new File(configuration.getString("errors").orElseThrow(Configuration.missing("errors"))).getAbsoluteFile();
041
042        if (!errorLog.getParentFile().exists() && !errorLog.getParentFile().mkdirs()) {
043            logger.error("Could not create directories for {} ({})", errorLog, name);
044        }
045
046        out = new FileOutputStream(errorLog, true);
047
048        // Attempt recovery
049        File recoveryLog = new File(configuration.getString("recovery").orElseThrow(Configuration.missing("recovery"))).getAbsoluteFile();
050        if (recoveryLog.exists()) {
051            FileInputStream recoveryIn = new FileInputStream(recoveryLog);
052            JsonNode recoveryNode = yamlMapper.readTree(recoveryIn);
053            recoveryIn.close();
054            if (recoveryNode instanceof ArrayNode recoveredItems) {
055                logger.info("Recovering {} items for subscriber '{}'", recoveredItems.size(), name);
056                int recoveredCount = 0;
057                int failedCount = 0;
058                for (JsonNode recoveredItem : recoveredItems) {
059                    WithMetadata<ArrayNode> arrayNodeWithMetadata = new WithMetadata<>(
060                            new Metadata((ObjectNode) recoveredItem.get("metadata")),
061                            (ArrayNode) recoveredItem.get("events"));
062
063                    CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
064                    persistentSubscriber.handle(arrayNodeWithMetadata, result);
065
066                    try {
067                        result.orTimeout(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS).join();
068                        recoveredCount++;
069                    } catch (Throwable e) {
070                        failedCount++;
071                        // Write to error log again
072                        handle(arrayNodeWithMetadata, e);
073                    }
074                }
075
076                logger.info("Recovered {} items, {} failed, for subscriber '{}'", recoveredCount, failedCount, name);
077
078                // Empty out recovery file no matter what
079                recoveryLog.delete();
080
081                new FileOutputStream(recoveryLog).close(); // Just create the file as an empty file to indicate to users where to put attempts at recovery
082            }
083        } else {
084            if (!recoveryLog.getParentFile().exists() && !recoveryLog.getParentFile().mkdirs()) {
085                logger.error("Could not create directories for {} ({})", errorLog, name);
086            }
087            new FileOutputStream(recoveryLog).close(); // Just create the file as an empty file to indicate to users where to put attempts at recovery
088        }
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public void handle(WithMetadata<ArrayNode> arrayNodeWithMetadata, Throwable exception) throws IOException {
093        StringWriter exceptionWriter = new StringWriter();
094        exception.printStackTrace(new PrintWriter(exceptionWriter));
095        String exceptionAsString = exceptionWriter.toString();
096        ObjectNode entry = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
097        entry.set("metadata", arrayNodeWithMetadata.metadata().json());
098        entry.set("events", arrayNodeWithMetadata.event());
099        entry.set("error", JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(exceptionAsString));
100        ArrayNode singleEntryArray = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode(1);
101        singleEntryArray.add(entry);
102        yamlMapper.writeValue(out, singleEntryArray);
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public void close() throws IOException {
107        out.close();
108    }
109}
